video.title: Pompidou
video.synopsis: Pompidou, an oddball aristocrat who has lost his fortune, and his put-upon butler face new challenges in this dialogue-free visual sitcom.

episodes.synopsis: With no money or food in the trailer, Hove's efforts to find food land him in a sticky situation and Pompidou must come up with a solution.
episodes.title: Hunger

episodes.synopsis: When Hove wins the lottery instead of Pompidou, his personality changes dramatically, but Pompidou has a plan to return things to normal.
episodes.title: Lottery

episodes.synopsis: When Pompidou realizes that the bowl he gave to a friend is worth a million pounds, he and Hove try everything they can think of to get it back.
episodes.title: The Bowl

episodes.synopsis: Pompidou's wish for a Valentine's day date seems to come true when he meets a lady from a dating agency, but will she be wooed by his idea of romance?
episodes.title: The Date

episodes.synopsis: Fed up with Pompidou's piles of junk, Hove tries to donate some of it to a church fair, but Pompidou does his best to hold onto his belongings.
episodes.title: Hoarder

episodes.synopsis: When a repairman refuses to fix the trailer's broken heater on a very cold day, Pompidou and Hove hatch a plan to get out of town.
episodes.title: Cold
